title: I had this idea about a seperate elo?
body: If we made a seperate elo for people who haven't played their placement matches yet then it would help new players not to be paired with non new player making a better experience for all. and make the default mmr for level 30s bronze 5 not low silver, I can assure you people who just hit 30 and play ranked that are not smurfs are not a silver level, thoughts?

replies.body: Personally I think the default MMR should be lowered, especially since it's difficult to drop/no decay.
Yeah let's just make bronze 5's vs smurf's every time a smurf gets to 30, this idea seems legit.

would take hours for a queue that's disregarding any dodgers, i can assure that at least half of the player base that isn't level 30 are smurfs and would make placements for them that much easier and putting in a bronze 5 elo would not help them the least bit, considering they would be playing with people who clearly aren't very skilled at the game and putting themselves at the complete bottom of the elo ladder
